annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: July 16, 1947, 61 Stat. 356, ch. 258, art. I, title XIII, § 3

annoGroup.heading: Effective Dates
annoGroup.annotation: Section 601(b) of D.C. Law 6-209 provided that title III and sections 401, 402, 404, 405 and 406 of the act shall take effect on October 1, 1987.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Section 410(d) of D.C. Law 13-305 provided: “Section 406(a), (c), (j), (m), (p), (q), (s), (w), (bb), (dd), (ee), (hh) through (kk), (mm) through (oo), (qq) through (uu), (yy), (zz), (bbb), (ddd), and (fff) shall apply for all tax years or taxable periods beginning after December 31, 2000.”
